connect20/affinity_items.name: connect20/Affinity_Items

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/affinity_items.description: Increase your sales with new generation personalized recommendations: affinity items automatically displays to each visitor, on each page, the selection of products that best fits his/her tastes & needs. Give your customer an unrivaled experience with our real time multilingual algorithms. Use the most advanced personalization service on a success-based pricing.
